alert.note: Alert for Camden; Gloucester; Northwestern Burlington; Salem (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 12 at 9:31AM EST until March 12 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...In New Jersey, Gloucester, Salem, Northwestern Burlington and Camden. In Maryland, Kent MD. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...In addition to light snow accumulations, a flash freeze is possible this afternoon, with wet surfaces rapidly becoming icy due to falling temperatures.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
